post.body: kids love Rome! it is like disneyland.. esp for boys
SALE!!!
ok! I can spare $10!!! am also donating a prize to Menu for Hope.. as I do every year.
there is a festival almost everyday in Italy!!! where will you be when?
another tough ingredient! just found a cranberry coconut bar cookie on MsAdventures site that looks like a winner!
ha ha I know.. was just being baby! like pecan pie without pecans!
Maple???? I have a stash of american things.. maple syrup??? going to california to teach in Feb.. so will stock up again
was just joking.. as I probably can get pecans for €€€€€€€ like peanut butter.. €€€€€€€€ thanks!
some of the 5 star hotels now serve some as expensive munchies. so they are available.. but very €€€€€
Thanks.. send pecans! none here in Tuscany! can use hazelnuts!
vengo anch'io!!!
my favorite kind! it is so nice to eat someone elses food!
yummy I haven't gotten my panettone yet! prefer it toasted
My big day was when I yelled at a guy on the bus that was rubbing up against me! I HATE THAT
- brava... Italy has done the same to me!
I wrote about mine on my blog. roast instead of boil the squash, and do 50/50 with potato, no egg - light on flour~ perfetto
I think it just started today.. maybe not up yet
GREAT PRIZE!!!
can't wait for the new book to come out! love the cover!!!
have you been to Maurizio Santin's new place in Rome, Cuoco Nero? my friend Gaia is his chef!
che tempo fa a Roma?
will stay in touch! sur la table is a tight place to get into. I am friends with robert Reynolds, he has a cooking studio
yup, eugene on FEb 25th now looking for a place to teach in Portland!
good luck with your tabs!
I know I am going to Eugene, Or to teach.. and hope to tg on Seattle! end of Feb- last week
I will look, someone wrote about doing your own, I tweeked my own
WOW.. here it is cold but sunny- will be in SF in FEB teaching see ya!
am looking at a place called volterra.. owned by friends of friends
send me louis number I can call now! have skype!
thanks! just got a great connection... hope it works out!
if I find a place to teach!
thanks, their calendar looks full while I am there.heard of dianes Market classes? love the market!
I am another fan or Pere LaChaise.. incredible statuary!
what machine did you get?
for me Fannie Farmer!
Food bloggers in Europe.. contact @rosso to donate to Menu for Hope fundraiser- Xmas is the time for giving- other bloggers @chezpim
WOW still bad weather everywhere here.. storms, floods, landslides! I am off to NAples.. SNOW???
I just joined the foodbloggers Twitter Group http://tgr.me/g/foodbloggers and you can too. Please Retweet.
found bag of frozen cranberries in Freezer... what to make?
26 year old irish guy falls into Tevere drunk and taking foto; falls into river and dies!
despite strikes, arrived early on the Island of Ischia outside of Naples to SUN!!! off for a shot of expresso!
arrived in naples in time for dinner with Rose Levy Beranbaum.
heading down to Naples on PR trip, bread fest! hope it includes BABA!!! Pizza, fab bread, pastries? report will follow!
Just saw menu for hope already has $$$$ the show is on!
